summary: Website project named "VlogunrealPromo" to offer/generate AI promotional videos for brands such as restaurants, hotels, etc.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal cinematic logo mark, abstract camera/film motif, dark background variant (vlogunrealpromo-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide wordmark lockup “VlogunrealPromo” in a modern cinematic style (vlogunrealpromo-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png)
- Cinematic hero background illustration with subtle film/grain lighting, no text (vlogunrealpromo-hero-bg.dim_1600x900.png)
- Promotional video thumbnail image: Restaurant concept, cinematic food/ambient lighting (example-thumb-restaurant.dim_800x450.png)
- Promotional video thumbnail image: Hotel concept, luxury interior lighting (example-thumb-hotel.dim_800x450.png)
- Promotional video thumbnail image: Cafe concept, cozy warm tones (example-thumb-cafe.dim_800x450.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive marketing website for the brand name “VlogunrealPromo” that targets Restaurants, Hotels, and similar businesses looking for AI promotional videos.

Implement core site sections/pages: Hero, Services/What you get, Industries (Restaurants/Hotels/etc), How it works, Pricing (informational only), Examples/Portfolio gallery, FAQ, and Contact/Request CTA.

Add a “Request a Promo Video” form that collects lead details and requirements, including: business name, business type (Restaurant/Hotel/Other), contact name, email, phone/WhatsApp, location (city/country), website/social links, desired video length, desired style/mood, language, deadline (date), budget range, and free-text notes.
Connect the frontend form submission to the backend using the project’s actor integration and manage submission state with React Query (loading, success, error).
Add an “Examples” gallery section that showcases multiple promotional video concepts using static thumbnail cards (title, short description, and image).

Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme appropriate for a premium promo-video studio: cinematic dark neutrals with warm accents (avoid blue/purple), modern typography, and consistent spacing/components across all sections.

Add a static assets integration to render the generated brand images (logo/wordmark/hero/examples) from frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the appropriate sections (header/hero/examples).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create the "VlogunrealPromo" website for brands (restaurants, hotels, etc.) to get AI promotional videos
Persist promo-video requests in the Motoko backend canister with stable storage and expose an API to create a new request and fetch a request by its reference ID.
